HTML5 - Progression - better way

  • Separate content (data) from print instructions or presentation
  • Define a « Lingua Franca » (standards)
  • give the content the information needed so it could be interpreted correctly only by its nature or role
  • HTML does that by marking-up (or labeling) the content based on its function on the document
    • This is a title
    • This is a paragraph
    • ...
  • Once something is "labeled", we know what we're supposed to do with them.
